hero.title: Your Modern STOMP Client
hero.subtitle: A powerful, intuitive WebSocket messaging client for developers

realtime.title: Real-time Communication
realtime.description: Connect and communicate with WebSocket servers in real-time with STOMP protocol support

performance.title: High Performance
performance.description: Optimized for handling high message volumes with minimal resource usage

intuitive.title: Intuitive Interface
intuitive.description: User-friendly interface designed for both beginners and experienced developers

customizable.title: Customizable
customizable.description: Easily configure and customize StomPilot to suit your needs

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: Keep your data safe with built-in security features

cloud.title: Cloud Integration
cloud.description: Seamlessly integrate with cloud services for easy deployment and management

testimonial1.name: John Doe
testimonial1.content: I've been using STOMPilot for a few months now and it's been a game-changer for our team. The real-time communication features are top-notch and the performance is unmatched.

testimonial2.name: Jane Smith
testimonial2.content: I've tried a few different STOMP clients in the past, but STOMPilot is by far the best. The intuitive interface makes it easy to use, even for beginners.

testimonial3.name: Alex Johnson
testimonial3.content: We've been using STOMPilot for our internal messaging system and it's been a great experience. The customizable features allow us to tailor the client to our specific needs.

mac.description: Universal binary for Intel and Apple Silicon

installation.steps:

2. Run the installer
3. Follow the setup wizard
